text: Saratus is a genus of Australian jumping spiders containing the single species, Saratus hesperus. It was first described by J. C. Otto & D. E. Hill in 2017, and has only been found in Australia. It is placed in the tribe Euophryini of the subfamily Salticinae. ==References== ==External links== Category:Monotypic Salticidae genera Category:Salticidae
title: Saratus
